data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Pinus contorta (Lodgepole pine) from sample LONE-61

Exposition E, Slope 15 deg, Geology: Granitschutt, Tree line 3150 m, av. Tree height 18 m, Tree cover 50%, Shrub cover 40%, Herb cover 30%, Vegatation type: PICO-Best. in stark verwitt. Schlucht. Het. , Film number: 732A
